Description.Text: Facilities Travellers can feel at home in one of the 85 rooms. Services and facilities at the hotel include a restaurant and a dining area. Guests with their own vehicles can make use of the available parking spaces. Rooms Each of the rooms is appointed with air conditioning. Amenities in all rooms include a mini fridge. The hotel offers family rooms and non-smoking rooms. Sports/Entertainment The establishment offers attractions including sport and entertainment opportunities. A pool and an outdoor pool are available to guests.
